We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private AverageDirectionalIndex _adx;
// In Initialize()
_adx = ADX(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_adx.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "ADX Is Ready", _adx.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ADX Positive Directional Index", _adx.PositiveDirectionalIndex);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ADX Negative Directional Index", _adx.NegativeDirectionalIndex);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ADX Warm Up Period", _adx.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ADX Current", _adx.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ADX Name", _adx.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ADX Samples", _adx.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.adx = self.ADX(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.adx.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ADX Is Ready", self.adx.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ADX Positive Directional Index", self.adx.PositiveDirectionalIndex);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ADX Negative Directional Index", self.adx.NegativeDirectionalIndex);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ADX Warm Up Period", self.adx.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ADX Current", self.adx.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ADX Name", self.adx.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ADX Samples", self.adx.Samples);
